scripts.dev: bun run dev:api & bun run dev:admin
scripts.build: bun run --cwd apps/api build && bun run --cwd apps/admin build
scripts.type-check: bun run --cwd packages/shared type-check && bun run --cwd packages/core type-check && bun run --cwd apps/api type-check && bun run --cwd apps/admin type-check
scripts.lint: biome check packages apps/api && bun run --cwd apps/admin lint
scripts.lint:fix: biome check --write packages apps/api && bun run --cwd apps/admin lint:fix
